import { useState } from "react" import "./ExpenseForm.css" const ExpenseForm = props =>{ const submitHandler = event =>{ event.preventDefault(); let item = { title : event.title.value, amount : event.amount.value, date : event.date.value } event.title.value = '' event.amount.value = '' event.date.value = new Date() props.onSaveExpenseData(item) } return
} export default ExpenseForm
